name: Aspectuer
description: My submission to a game jam hosted by this guy names after an abomination of a 3d shape. A short game about being able to see beyond, and find hidden traps. Every level your abilities SWITCH. There is no mouse control, as it is an unfortunate limitation of the game engine I chose. Feel free to  S W I T C H  the game on and play it. (And for the 2 people out there wondering, according to google translate, Aspectuer means "To see".)
